info.task: read information about collapsed disclosure button
info.title: Read information about a collapsed disclosure button

setupScript.name: moveFocusToFirstDisclosure
setupScript.description: sets focus on the first disclosure button
setupScript.source:
// sets focus on the first disclosure button
testPageDocument.querySelector('button[aria-controls="faq1_desc"]').focus();

user: With focus on the first disclosure button in the list of frequently asked questions, read information about the button.
instructions.raw: With focus on the first disclosure button in the list of frequently asked questions, read information about the button.
instructions.mode: Toggle Quick Nav OFF by pressing the Left Arrow and Right Arrow keys at the same time.

assertions.expectation: Name, 'What do I do if I have a permit for an assigned lot, but can't find a space there?', is conveyed
State of the button (collapsed) is conveyed
